content: Great Salt Lake is the largest inland body of water on the Pacific flyway, a critical habitat for migrating birds. Water diversion is causing the lake to shrink significantlyâ€¦.The monumental earthwork Spiral Jetty (1970) was created by Robert Smithson out of black basalt  rocks and earth gathered from the site. The walkable landmark is a 15 feet wide coil stretching 1500 feet into the lake, although the seasons determine whether it may be uncovered or totally covered with water__no.0682, 2021. #Utah #Pacificflyway #birdmigration
